nodes.text: The Onderon power generator was an electric generator in Iziz, the capital city of Onderon, that ran to several smaller generators to power the city. The smaller generators were linked to the main unit and would not function if the main unit was disabled. During the Onderonian Civil War, the power generator was hit by the Onderon rebels, including Saw Gerrera, Steela Gerrera, Lux Bonteri, and Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano.
